mapper.select: SELECT yp.id,yp.addtime,yp.qiyebianhao, yp.qiyemingcheng,yp.fuzeren, yp.`yonghuming`,yp.`xingming`, yp.zhaopingangwei,yp.dianhua,yp.jianli, yp.`sfsh`,yp.`shhf` FROM yingpinxinxi yp LEFT JOIN qiyexinxi q ON q.qiyebianhao = yp.qiyebianhao LEFT JOIN yonghu Y ON Y.id = q.userid LEFT JOIN zhaopinxinxi z ON q.qiyebianhao = z.qiyebianhao WHERE userid = #{id} AND z.`zhaopingangwei`=yp.`zhaopingangwei` AND yp.del=0;

SELECT yp.id FROM yingpinxinxi yp LEFT JOIN qiyexinxi q ON q.qiyebianhao = yp.qiyebianhao LEFT JOIN yonghu Y ON Y.id = q.userid LEFT JOIN zhaopinxinxi z ON q.qiyebianhao = z.qiyebianhao WHERE yp.id = #{id} AND z.`zhaopingangwei`=yp.`zhaopingangwei` AND yp.yonghuming=#{yonghuming} and yp.del=0;

SELECT yp.id FROM yingpinxinxi yp LEFT JOIN qiyexinxi q ON q.qiyebianhao = yp.qiyebianhao LEFT JOIN yonghu Y ON Y.id = q.userid LEFT JOIN zhaopinxinxi z ON q.qiyebianhao = z.qiyebianhao WHERE userid = #{yonghuId} AND z.`zhaopingangwei`=yp.`zhaopingangwei` AND yp.id=#{id} AND yp.del=0;
